title: Select
name: select
description: A fully customizable select component for Astro projects, built with composable primitives and minimal JavaScript. Supports grouped options, icons, keyboard navigation, and accessible semantics by default. Designed to be flexible, themeable, and production-ready.

usage.import: import { Select, SelectContent, SelectGroup, SelectLabel, SelectOption, SelectTrigger } from "@/src/components/select"

examples.title: Basic select
examples.code:
<Select class="w-60">
    <SelectTrigger>Choose your destination</SelectTrigger>
    <SelectContent>
        <SelectGroup>
            <SelectLabel>Favorite places</SelectLabel>
            <SelectOption value="home">Home</SelectOption>
            <SelectOption value="office">Office</SelectOption>
            <SelectOption value="beach">Beach</SelectOption>
        </SelectGroup>
    </SelectContent>
</Select>

examples.title: Multiple groups
examples.code:
<Select class="w-60">
    <SelectTrigger>Choose your destination</SelectTrigger>
    <SelectContent>
        <SelectGroup>
            <SelectLabel>Favorite places</SelectLabel>
            <SelectOption value="home">Home</SelectOption>
            <SelectOption value="office">Office</SelectOption>
        </SelectGroup>
        <SelectGroup class="border-t">
            <SelectLabel>Recent trips</SelectLabel>
            <SelectOption value="paris">Paris</SelectOption>
            <SelectOption value="new-york">New York</SelectOption>
        </SelectGroup>
    </SelectContent>
</Select>

examples.title: With icons
examples.code:
<Select class="w-60">
    <SelectTrigger>Choose icon</SelectTrigger>
    <SelectContent>
        <SelectGroup class="grid-cols-4 [&_svg]:w-5 [&_svg]:h-5">
            <SelectOption value="alarm"><Alarm /></SelectOption>
            <SelectOption value="star"><Star /></SelectOption>
            <SelectOption value="globe"><Globe/></SelectOption>
            <SelectOption value="mail"><Mail /></SelectOption>
        </SelectGroup>
    </SelectContent>
</Select>
